Culinote is a new type of food-blogging tool that makes it super easy to share your content on the web, mobile phones, and tablets. Culinote requires absolutely no programming or design knowledge.
We realized that a blogging platform dedicated to food was missing in the blogosphere. So we decided to develop tools that make it easy to showcase food stories, memories, and recipes in a beautiful way.

It’s all about the food...
We believe that food blogging, from writing the ingredient list to sharing a great recipe with your family and friends, should be incredibly easy and fun.

Culitools
Snapshots, pictures, recipes, step-by-step instructions, timers, ingredient lists, you name it, it’s all in here. Plus, we’re constantly working on creating new culitools.

Drag-n-drop
Drag, drop then rearrange your text, images, recipes, ingredients, all on the fly. With Culinote’s innovative interface, you’re able to see exactly what you're going to share.

Search optimized
Generate visits and increase traffic. Culinote helps sites like Google generate more relevant search results directly to your content.

Smart content
Help your readers customize ingredients and quantities. Recipes are all adjustable, and with a click of a button your readers can change the units of measure to serve as many people as they want!

Social media integration
Expand your reader-base with integrated sharing tools that help you promote your posts on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and Pinterest.

Mobile and tablet ready
Post once, and you're done. All of your posts are automatically formatted to look beautiful on desktops, tablets and mobile phones. It just works!

Food community
Be social. A great part of the food experience is sharing it with those we love. Integrated comments and interest-based following features make it easy to find new friends that share your passions.
